data.name: Group your pupils
data.description:
You are a teacher at a local school and you have some group work for your class to carry out!

You are given a register of pupils' names and you need to put them into groups of 2 if there is a even number of pupils, or groups of 2 and one group of 3 if there is an odd number of pupils. 

The input list will be an array of strings, with one string per pupil. There will always be at least 2 pupils in each class. Provide the output as an array of arrays of strings. The last array in the array must contain the group of 3 pupils.

For example, given:

["John Smith", "Jane Doe", "Sam Jones", "Ian Bankins", "Laura Wise"]

You should return:

[["John Smith", "Jane Doe"], ["Sam Jones", "Ian Bankins", "Laura Wise"]]
